attributes.action: Consider adding religious denomination to ID cards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We propose, in the event of ID cards or biometric measures, to consider the inclusion of preferred religious denomination [or lack of, etc] of the individual. This would allow in the event of certain situations; such as accidents, incapacity, illness or death, the relevant services to be better tailored to suit their needs.
